# plotAreaSize

**Instance Property**

The size of the plot in the chart.

## Declaration

```swift
var plotAreaSize: CGSize { get }
```

## Discussion

The plot is the area between the x and y axes, not including the axes themselves.

A chart must exist in the context of the chart proxy.
